title: The Most Beautiful Insanity
description: A Heather Wilde Crime Novel, Book One​…THE TRAGIC PRICE OF PERFECT BEAUTY…Ophelia Lake is a fashion model objectified and abused by the industry she struggles desperately to be a part of. She lives in Miami Beach with Drexel Waters, a more successful male model with whom she shares a toxic, co-dependent relationship. Despite his chronic abuse, she does anything for him, no matter how depraved or illegal. Eventually Ophelia becomes pushed to the limits of mental torture, driving her to commit a deadly act she can never undo. Murderous forces close in as twisted sex, seductive beauty, and selective morality clash in a shattering climax that will leave the reader stunned. For readers 18 and over only!
author: Heather  Wilde
